text: Yeh log jab koi sharmnaak kaam karte hain to kehte hain humne apne baap dada ko isi tareeqe par paya hai aur Allah hi ne humein aisa karne ka hukum diya hai. Insey kaho Allah be-hayayi ka hukm kabhi nahin diya karta. Kya tum Allah ka naam lekar woh baatein kehte ho jinke mutaaliq tumhein ilm nahin hai (woh Allah ki taraf se hain)
